body_html:
@gunan Good question, I didn't take that into account...

In that case I guess you can keep requiring enum34 for both Python 3.4 and 3.5 too.

But for Python 3.6, it's wrong to install it. The installation works fine, but as soon as you try to use TensorFlow, it will crash hard on top of Python 3.6 with the error I mentioned.
